# Changelog

- Fixed ruc_juridica.py to allow Rollo/Tomo of up to 9 digits.

- Fixed Readme documentation

## [1.0.1] - 2024-01-23

- Fixed package import problems

## [1.0.0] - 2024-01-22

- Initial stable release.
